# Scalykind (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Yuan-ti only (regardless of deity worshiped) |
| | *Pharaonic:* | Apep |
| | *Toril:* | Finder Wyvernspur, Sebek, Set, Tiamat, Ubtao |

**Granted Power:** Rebuke or command animals (reptilian creatures and snakes only) as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. Use this ability a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

**Scalykind Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Fang (Spell)|Magic Fang]]****:** One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.

**2** **[[Animal Trance (Spell)|Animal Trance]]****:** Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

**3** **[[Magic Fang, Greater (Spell)|Magic Fang, Greater]]****:** One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max +5).

**4 [[Poison (Spell)|Poison]]:** Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

**5** **[[Animal Growth (Spell)|Animal Growth]]****\*:** One animal doubles in size.

**6** **[[Eyebite (Spell)|Eyebite]]****:** Target becomes [[Panicked|panicked]], [[Sickened|sickened]], and/or [[Comatose (Spell)|comatose]].

**7** **[[Creeping Doom (Spell)|Creeping Doom]]****:** Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.

**8** **[[Animal Shapes (Spell)|Animal Shapes]]****:** One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal**.**

**9** **[[Shapechange (Spell)|Shapechange]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Transforms you into certain creatures, and you can change forms once per round.

   \*Affects ophidian and reptilian creatures only.


| **Source:** | Gods and Magic, pg. 51 |
|---|---|
| | Deities and Demigods (WotC), pg. 215 |
| | Ghostwalk (WotC), pgs. 46-47 |
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 90 |
| | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 279 |

**GM Note**

This domain first appeared in the *FORGOTTEN REALMS Campaign Setting.*
